author: ajaquith
msg: Refactored TestEngine so that MockRountrips and other heavier sessions are lazily initialized. Also added a property to AuthenticationManager that allows login throttling to be switched off (for example, during unit tests). The effect of these two changes cuts unit test times [on my machine] from 25 minutes down to about 4.5.

author: ajaquith
msg: Removed reference to Stripes MockServletContext in WebContainerAuthorizer. It should not have been there.
